items.summary: Fix the all-browser white screen by ensuring the React tree includes `ThemeProvider` before any component calls `useTheme` (e.g., `ThemeToggle`). Update the app composition (without modifying immutable files) so that `ThemeToggle` no longer throws `useTheme must be used within a ThemeProvider` at runtime.

Add a user-friendly top-level error boundary (or equivalent global runtime error handling) so that if any unexpected rendering error occurs, users see an English fallback message instead of a blank page, and the underlying error is logged to the console for debugging.
